hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Umar that the Prophet said, concerning a man who had a wife and he divorced her, then she married another man who divorced her before consummating the marriage with her, and (it was asked) whether she could go back to her first husband:"No, not until she tastes his sweetness

chapter.ara-name: باب إِحْلاَلِ الْمُطَلَّقَةِ ثَلاَثًا وَالنِّكَاحِ الَّذِي يُحِلُّهَا بِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Making A Thrice-Divorced Woman Lawful (To Return To Her First Husband) And The Marriage That Makes T
